articles.title: About this site
articles.description:
This website posts reflections on articles, courses, seminars, and conferences in the following fields: epidemiology, applied statistics, causal inference, real-world evidence, health economics, cardiovascular diseases, dementia, gerontology, public health, and others.
This website also posts reflections on random books and films.

articles.title: Bertil Gustav

          About this website
          This website posts reflections on articles, courses,
          seminars, and conferences in the following fields:
          epidemiology, applied statistics, causal inference, real-world
          evidence, health economics, cardiovascular diseases, dementia,
          gerontology, public health, and others.
          Additionally, this website provides reflections on various
          books and films.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Bertil Gustav

articles.title: Untitled
articles.description: A new article created using the Distill format.
articles.contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill for R Markdown at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.
